dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: KITTI is one of the most popular autonomous driving datasets, which adopts four high-resolution cameras, a Velodyne HDL-64E LiDAR, and an advanced positioning system to collect data from different real-world driving scenarios. It supports diverse perception tasks, including 3D object detection, 3D object tracking, and depth completion.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:description: Waymo Open Dataset is designed for autonomous driving, providing a large-scale dataset that supports various perception tasks. It emphasizes scalability in perception for autonomous driving applications.
dcterms:title: Waymo

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar
Varun Bankiti

Sourabh Vora
Venice Erin Liong
Qiang Xu
Anush Krishnan
Yu Pan
Giancarlo Baldan
Oscar Beijbom
dcterms:description: NuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving that includes data from various sensors, providing a comprehensive resource for training and evaluating perception systems.
dcterms:title: NuScenes
